text: Is there any way to speed up NiftiSpheresMasker and NiftiLabelsMasker (e.g. via joblib, iterables, etc.)? Maybe this functionality already exists or is in the works, but I haven't been able to find it.  If it does not yet exist, this would be a very cool feature to incorporate. I would think that these functions would be mpi-parallelizable across coordinates (i.e. the total runtime should theoretically be reducible to the length of time that it takes to extract signal from a single sphere/label assuming that number of coordinates = # cores?)
title: Accelerating the speed of NiftiSpheresMasker and NiftiLabelsMasker?

text: Yes, PR will come soon. All masker families should benefit via joblib caching and parallelization and multi-subject extraction. This is part of issue opened at #1240.
